caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. JOSEPH J. BERNSTEIN,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department.
opinion.attorneys:
Robert H. Elder and Otho S. Bowling for appellant.
Charles J. Dodd, District Attorney (James I. Cuff of counsel), for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment affirmed; no opinion.
Concur: CARDOZO, Ch. J., POUND, CRANE, ANDREWS, LEHMAN, KELLOGG and O'BRIEN, JJ.
